share on x kw kathryn ware. jun 11 at 8:23 am to mr. roger reed's wife, roger and samantha:you have my sincere and deepest sympathy at the passing of your husband and father. my prayers are with you and your entire family during this most difficult time. know that he is no longer in pain or suffering. he is with our heavenly father, resting in peace. rest in paradise mr. roger reed. may god surround you all with a peace that surpasses all understanding and give you comfort. sincerely, kathryn ware, m. ed. truven health analytics. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 11. 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm presley funeral home695 buffalo valley road. cookeville, tn, us, 38501. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. visitation. jun 12. 9:00 am - 11:00 am presley funeral home695 buffalo valley road. cookeville, tn, us, 38501. get order flowers now for roger's visitation funeral servicejun 12. 11:00 am presley funeral home695 buffalo valley road. cookeville, tn, us, 38501. get order flowers now for roger's funeral service wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook presley funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
